EmailTemplate.name: ENG-Multi Hypervisor/Hyper-V-Nurture.ENG-Mult-Hypervisor-Early-04.04-30-Day-Tria
EmailTemplate.subject: Be Hypervisor & Vendor Agnostic
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[http://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=eng-mult&utm_content=earl04]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, We get it. There are numerous reasons why heterogeneous environments exist: financial cost, legacy systems, data center consolidation. These business realities are easily managed with Turbonomic. Just set up your hypervisor targets in Turbonomic—Microsoft Hyper-V, VMware vCenter, Red Hat RHEV-M, or Citrix XenServer—and let our software do the rest. Are you ready to see all that Turbonomic has to offer you? Give the free trial a shot <[[http://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=eng-mult&utm_content=earl04]]> and see just how Turbonomic will drive your environment to perpetual health. <[[http://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=eng-mult&utm_content=earl04]]> - The Turbonomic Team
